# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a bar item from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating a bar item

- **init()**: Initializes the bar item to its default state.

items.description: Initializes the bar item to its default state.
items.name: init()
